content: Defeat the boss to unlock the purple seals preventing you from entering all of the jail cells in the Pagoda. The Enslaved Yaksha is locked inside one of these cells.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Enslaved_Yaksha_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Enslaved Yaksha Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Enslaved Yaksha Location'.
The content is as follows:
Defeat the boss to unlock the purple seals preventing you from entering all of the jail cells in the Pagoda. The Enslaved Yaksha is locked inside one of these cells.
